EmailTemplate.name: CHN-2017-02-28-17-Tactical Event.EMAIL-Registration Email
EmailTemplate.subject: {{lead.First Name:default=}}'s Confirmation to the American Tactical Arms Event| February 28, 2017
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
Hi {{Lead.First Name:default=}}, Thank you for registering to attend the Turbonomic, Data Blue, Fuze & Rubrik Sponsored Event! We will be distributing additional details in the weeks to come. Event: American Tactical Arms Attending: {{lead.Full Name:default=edit me}} Company: {{company.Company Name:default=}} Event Time: February 28th at 11:00am Event Location: American Tactical Training Arms Center in St. Augustine, FL
If you have any questions or concerns please reach out to Carolyn.Green@turbonomic.com <[[mailto:marketing@turbonomic.com]]> -The Turbonomic Team
